text: Iqbal Dawood Pakwala is a Pakistani businessman and former provincial minister of Sindh in 2013 in a caretaker capacity. In July 2013, Pakwala was arrested for his involvement in a multi-billion dollar scam involving the Employees Old-Age Benefits Institution (EOBI). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Pakistani people of Gujarati descent Category:Pakistani industrialists Category:Pakistani prisoners and detainees Category:Provincial ministers of Sindh Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Iqbal Dawood Pakwala
